parts.text:
```json
{
"application": "Slurm",
"software": [
"PrgEnv-gnu",
"openmpi-4.1.5",
"frankben",
"frankben_t"
],
"resources": [
"cpu",
"cores",
"threads",
"memory"
]
}
```
The script uses the Slurm workload manager to run the Frankben and Frankben_t applications on a cluster of nodes. It uses the PrgEnv-gnu module to set up the GNU compiler environment, and openmpi-4.1.5 for parallel execution. 

The script requires a significant amount of CPU resources, using 64 MPI ranks and 128 cores per node. It also uses OpenMP threads for parallel processing on each core. The amount of memory required will depend on the size of the data being processed.
